amendment.description: An amendment numbered 17 printed in House Report 116-457 to extend CARES student loan protections for private student loan borrowers who were left out of the CARES Act. It also amendment extends the private student loan protections to September 30, 2021.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 17 printed in House Report 116-457 to extend CARES student loan protections for private student loan borrowers who were left out of the CARES Act. It also amendment extends the private student loan protections to September 30, 2021.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Adams amendment (A012) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: The previous question was ordered on the amendment (A012) pursuant to the rule.
Amendment agreed to by House: On agreeing to the Adams amendment (A012) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Adams amendment (A012) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A012) offered by Ms. Adams.
